main event: A round, luminous UFO was observed in Porto Alegre, Brazil for 45 minutes at an altitude of 45,000 feet, making no sound.
interesting points: The sighting was recorded by a major from the Brazilian Air Force (FAB) who believes in UFO sightings,The UFO was observed around Gravital Air Base with 150 FAB personnel present, Reports indicate that Brazilian airline pilots have had close encounters with similar objects, The object was described as approximately 50 feet in diameter and capable of high-speed travel, The credibility of the sightings has led to a shift in skepticism from the reporting officer.
witness description: FAB personnel and a major from FAB
